content.p: Make sure you don't miss out on our Connected we thrive activities, alumni events, university news and opportunities around the world by sharing your contact details with us. It's quick and easy to do â€“ just fill in the update form below. If you have any questions, you can contact us for help at alumni-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk. Did you graduate from our China or Malaysia campuses? If so, please use the following links to update your details: Malaysia Campus | China Campus How we use your information We are committed to protecting your personal information and being transparent about what we do with it. We use your data to send you relevant communications; offer you beneficial services; and identify future opportunities for providing support which may be of interest to you. You can find out more in our privacy notice. Please contact us by email at databaseenquiries@nottingham.ac.uk or in writing: Campaign and Alumni Relations Office, B50 CARO Team Zone, Kings Meadow Campus, University of Nottingham, Lenton Lane, Nottingham, NG7 2NR Speak to our Alumni Engagement team or follow us on social media for the latest alumni news. Email: alumni-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Phone: +44 (0)115 823 2408 Address: Campaign and Alumni Relations Office B50 CARO Team Zone Kings Meadow Campus University of Nottingham Lenton Lane Nottingham NG7 2NR
